DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to compare medical and surgical treatments of benign prostate hyperplasia in patients who have non muscle invasive bladder cancer for tumour recurrence and progression.
DOC.brief_title: Comparison of Medical and Surgical Treatments of Benign Prostate Hyperplasia in Patients Who Have Low Grade Non Muscle Invasive Bladder Cancer for Tumour Recurrence and Progression
DOC.criteria: Patients who have non muscle invasive bladder cancer male patients patients between 4080 years old Patients who have previous prostate surgery Patients who have muscle invasive bladder cancer
